title: Did ABC, CBS, and NBC Black Out Pam Bondi’s Legal Defense of Trump?
subtitle: Although the claim that the media "blacked out" coverage of a given topic is common, it can often be misleading.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The "Big Three" networks of ABC, CBS, and NBC "blacked out" coverage of Pam Bondi's legal defense of U.S. President Donald Trump during his impeachment trial.
